name: Sticky Comment
author: Foad Adeli

sections.description:
Make your favorite comments stand out with Sticky Comment! This easy-to-use plugin allows you to pin your favorite comments on top, so your most valuable feedbacks are always visible. It’s great for pinning reviews from the well-known authors, highlighting positive reviews, and featuring feedbacks you want users to see first.

How to Use for Blog Posts?

  1. Install and activate the Sticky Comment plugin.
  2. Go to Dashboard Menu > Comments.
  3. Hover over the comment you want to pin, and click the Pin button.
  4. The comment will now be pinned on top of the comments section.
  5. You can also unpin comments anytime using Unpin button.

How to Use for WooCommerce Products?

  1. Install and activate the Sticky Comment plugin.
  2. Go to Dashboard Menu > Products > Reviews.
  3. Click the Pin button under the Sticky Comment column.
  4. The review will now be pinned on top of the product reviews section.
  5. You can also unpin reviews anytime using Unpin button.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin for WooCommerce reviews?

Absolutely! The Pin and Unpin actions are available for both blog posts and WooCommerce products.

What if I have compatibility issues or questions?

Although this plugin is tested and is fully compatible with WordPress and WooCommerce, please don’t hesitate to contact me if you’re facing any problem! I’m available to help troubleshoot any compatibility issue and answer questions you may have. Just send me an email: info@foadadeli.ir
